provider.name: HD+ #13
provider.servicehacks:
# Skip test services, interactive services, and chat line spam. blacklist = ( "123-Damenwahl", "ALT Sendersuchlauf starten!!", "Achtung Sexy TV", "Babestation24", "BunnyClub24", "Clipmobile", "Date Line", "Deutsche Girls 24 TV", "Deutsche Girls 24 TV ", "Dreamgirls24 TV", "EROTIKA TV - NEU!", "Eros TV", "Erotiksat24 TV", "Fotohandy", "Fundorado TV", "GayBoys LIVE", "health.tv", # test card "Heiss und Sexy TV", "Lustkanal24 TV", "Maennersache TV", "Mobile Sex", "multithek (Internet)", "SEX-Kontakte", "Traumfrauen TV" )
if service["service_name"] in blacklist or "Test" in service["service_name"]: skip = True
